comment.author: 21686909@N07
comment._content: He was on top of the jazz world here.  He, Parker, and Monk were the kings of BeBop.

comment.author: 52682399@N07
comment._content:
The Gillespie Orchestra played at the Spotlite Club (former Famous Door) from mid April until June 27, 1946.
("Band Routes:" Baltimore Afro-American, April 27, 1946, 38).
("Band Routes:" Baltimore Afro-American, June 22, 1946, 22)
